boardgame.name: King Me!
King Up!
Viva il Re!
Vive le Roi
¡Viva el Rey!
Царь Горы
造王者！
boardgame.description: From the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;With the announcement of the King's retirement, the pirouette for succession begins! All of his subjects from cobbler to cook, painter to paladin, debutante to duchess bustle about the castle in preparation for the succession. One of your favorites can attain the throne. But, beware! It will require clever maneuvering and selective positioning to be in the right place at the right time to achieve the crown!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the box:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The King has retired! Paladins, cooks, painters and all the other subjects in the kingdom bustle about for the succession. Play your cards right and bring your favorite to the throne!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the rules:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Long live the king! A bluff and deduction game for 3-6 players, age 8 and up. The enlightened monarch Vladimir Miritiro, tired of reigning, has decided to choose his successor among his subjects. The players are helping him in this decision by advising their favorites and trying to crown one of them as the new king._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Shipping is 7.50$ within U.S., insurance 1.30$ opotional. Viva il Re! edition. With english rules.

EDIZIONE ITALIANA E MULTILINGUA Spedizione dall_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Italia. Spediamo in tutto il mondo con corriere oppure con raccomandata internazionale tracciabile (quando possibile). Il costo di spedizione con corriere 24/48h è €10,00 per l_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;italia, per gli altri paesi mandateci la richiesta per i costi. Massima serietà. Spedizioni rapide e precise. In caso di dubbi contattateci via mail. Il prodotto è nuovo, mai usato, ancora nel suo imballo originale e sigillato, scatola in ottime condizioni di conservazione. Possiamo combinare le spedizioni ed i pagamenti in soluzioni uniche per risparmiare le spese di commissione e trasporto. New, still sealed. Dispatched from Italy. We ship worldwide by courier or by registered international trackable (when possible). P _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; P with 24 / 48h courier is € 10,00 for Italy, for other countries send the request for the costs .. Maximum seriousness. fast and accurate shipments. If in doubt please contact us via email. Product is brand new, never used, still in its original sealed packaging, the box in excellent condition. Shipping all around the world with signed mail.
